title: Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, Londo launches its Christmas season 2015 with Harrods
text:
Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, Londo launches its Christmas season 2015 with Harrods Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, Londo launches its Christmas season 2015 with Harrods Details Category: 2015 Christmas Venues & Packages near you!   14:45 Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, London is partnering with world famous luxury department store and Knightsbridge neighbour, Harrods, to celebrate Christmas 2015. Festive offerings include A Very Harrods Christmas room package. Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, London will take pride of place in one of the capital’s leading Christmas spectacles, the Harrods festive window displays. Two windows artfully showcasing the hotel will be unveiled on 1 November 2015. 
Head pastry chef, Heather Kaniuk will use her creative talent for making petit gâteaux, macaroons and handmade chocolates for a Teddy Bear Tea, in honour of Benedict, Harrods 2015 Christmas Teddy; served at The Rosebery from 23 November 2015 through to 10 January 2016, priced at GBP53. The Christmas fairy tale continues with Harrods transforming public spaces at Mandarin Oriental Hyde Park, London, including the marble Lobby and The Rosebery, into a stunning, seasonal spectacle. With a red and gold colour theme, and a huge Christmas Tree in the Lobby as its centrepiece, the delightful display will be unveiled on 27 November 2015. A Very Harrods Christmas accommodation package starts from GBP615 inclusive of VAT per night, based on two rooms with two adults and two children sharing, and includes: • One night accommodation • Full English breakfast in the dining room overlooking Hyde Park • Christmas Welcome gift on arrival and presents in the guestroom, including the Harrods 2015 Teddy Bear • VIP appointment with Harrods Gift Bureau to find the perfect gift for your loved ones A Very Harrods Christmas accommodation package is valid between 23 November 2015 and 30 December 2015, and is subject to availability. Price excludes 5% discretionary service charge. Related articles
